channel.title: How does the Worldcracker work?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "How does the Worldcracker work?"

item.title: Re: How does the Worldcracker work?
item.content:encoded:
Yes, you are.

You Unleash on Day 1. Any WK that are listed as 'Defeated!' at the end of Day 1 (and thus die at the beginning of Day 2) gets the bonus. And it only gives extra Emblems based on Ranks actually obtained.

item.title: How does the Worldcracker work?
item.content:encoded: From what I can tell from the wiki, You Unleash on day 1 and it activates on day 2. Worldkai that hit Crippled on day 2 would then give emblems for every rank to everyone in your village on day 3, regardless of whether they fought or how high a rank a person got. Am I wrong?
